headline: Johnson Controls International plc (JCI): Among the Growing Dividend Stocks with Low PE Ratios
summary: We recently published a list of the 30 Growing Dividend Stocks with Low PE Ratios. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE:JCI) stands against other growing dividend stocks.
